name: Dolphin Squadron
storyline: It is the year 2053 and militaries across the globe have resorted to using animals in order to combat the rampant terrorism of the future. By this point in time, technology has progressed in such a way that humans and animals can now effectively communicate with one another; this ultimately allows for true collaboration between man and animal. Within the US Navy Seals, one particular aquatic organism has been selected and isolated from all others to be trained for a singular purpose. That organism is the dolphin.
summary: Dolphin Squadron is a vertical scrolling shooter where you play as a mechanized dolphin hired by the US Navy Seals to intercept dangerous underwater mines in order to save various coastal cities from utter devastation!
